full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANGS PA DANG, 'GAL RKYEN GYI TSUL LHONG SOGS ZHI BA LA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, ,SROG CHAGS RGYU SKONGS DANG, BAm SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYI YANG SNYIGS MAR SBYOR BA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHRUGS PA'I 'TSUB LHONGS KYI BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON SHIN TU @009B MANG PA YIN PA DANG, BSKANG BSHAGS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MO SHAR BA BZHIN, ,LAG LEN DU BSTER BSKABS, ,LHAG PAR LO SNGA PHYI TE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG DU 'CHED CING, ,MI SHIS PA'I LTAS MTSAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA'I KHU LDOG GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, ,BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAM SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNGS MA TSOGS PHRENG CUNG ZAD CING, ,LAG LEN BSAL BAR BGYIS TE,  DBEN GNAS BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU GYI KLAG CHOG CHU BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, ,'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI GNYAN PAS, ,GAR BOD BUM DU BYA ME RUNG GSUNGS PAS SNOD MIN LA GSUNG SKABS SHES PAR BYA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
